appDescription.message: Managing Your Assets Just Got Easier.

Keep__at__least__one__address__visible.message: Keep at least one wallet visible

At__least__one__enabled__chain__is__requ.message: Please enable at least one chain

enableChainContent.message: By enabling a chain, you’ll be able to make transactions on it.

switchChainDesc.message: This site will be connected to {{name}} for your next visit.

GasLimitMinimumValueAlert.message: Gas limit should be at least 21,000

you__need__to__unlock__wallet__first.message: You need to unlock wallet first!

CreatePasswordDesc.message: The password is used to unlock wallet, sign transactions or smart contracts and access mnemonic phrase.Remember it tightly and do not give it to anyone.

CreatePasswordTip.message: SafePal does not store or access your password. Please remember it tightly and do not give it to anyone.

Mnemonic__phrase1.message: Mnemonic phrase is the master key to your wallet. It can be used to recover your wallet on any compatible device. Those who hold it can take full control of the wallet. So do not give it to anyone.

Mnemonic__phrase2.message: SafePal will never access, store or ask for your mnemonic phrase, hence we cannot retrieve a mnemonic phrase once it is lost. Please keep it secure and offline (such as writing it down on a piece of paper or keeping it in <0>SafePal Cypher</0>). Do not screenshot or copy it to the clipboard.

Mnemonic__phrase3.message: Learn more about how to keep your mnemonic phrase safe <0>from here</0>

YourWalletReady1.message: Your wallet is ready for use!

YourWalletReady2.message: Now please name your new wallet

Scan__QR__code__with.message: Scan QR code with SafePal APP {{version}} or above.

createMnemonicsText.message: Write down the mnemonic phrase in order. Do not screenshot or send the phrase to others.

No__response__on__your__phone.message: No response from your SafePal App

Updating__wallet__information__from__Saf.message: Updating wallet information from SafePal APP

Target__wallet__not__found__in__this__ph.message: Target wallet is not found from the phone

disableChainAlert.message: Once disabled, the DApps and tokens from this chain will be removed from the wallet.

Wallet__name__should.message: The wallet name should be between 1-20 characters.

ImportMnemonicsLabel.message: Enter your mnemonic phrase to import the wallet

Click__the__words.message: Click the words in the correct order

ClickWordError.message: This is a wrong word. Please try again.

connectSiteTrust.message: Only connect your wallet with the sites that you trust.

ResetWalletDesc1.message: By resetting the extension, all of the existing wallets in it will be removed. So firstly make sure you have backed up the mnemonic phrase for these wallets.

ResetWalletDesc2.message: This action only removes the wallets from this extension. It will not remove the wallets from the blockchains. You can access the wallets on any compatible devices so long as you have the mnemonic phrase backup.

ImportMnemonicsTip__phrase0.message: Important! Read the instructions carefully before you start:

ImportMnemonicsTip__phrase1.message: • Do not copy and paste your mnemonic phrase here to avoid malicious attacks

ImportMnemonicsTip__phrase2.message: • Before you click next, make sure you are in a private environment with no cameras or people around you

ImportMnemonicsTip__phrase3.message: • After the wallet recovery, keep your mnemonic phrase in security locations

What__if__I__forgot__my__password.message: What if I forgot my password?

ViewExplorer.message: View my address on blockchain explorer

signOk.message: The transaction is submitted for on-chain confirmation

same__address__err.message: You can't transfer to the same address on the {{chain}} network.

NetworkError.message: The network is disconnected. Please check your network settings first.

ReceiveTip1.message: Please ensure that the receive address supports the {{chain}} network.

ReceiveTip2.message: This address can only accept assets on {{chain}} network. Sending any other types of tokens to this address will result in permanent loss.

welcomeTip.message: Managing Your Crypto Just Got Easier

welcome1.message: Support both EVM and non-EVM compatible chains including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Tron, Solana, Avalanche and more

welcome2.message: Built-in with cross-chain Swap and Bridge services

welcome3.message: Stay connected to DApps on different chains simultaneously

welcome4.message: Level up asset security by connecting to your SafePal App or S1 Hardware Wallet

moreAddressesTip.message: One wallet can generate multiple receiving addresses under its public key. By enabling this feature, the wallet will automatically generate a new address after every transaction. This is a security feature to protect your privacy and prevent third-parties from tracking your transactions on the blockchain.

SetDefaultWallet.message: Set SafePal as default extension wallet

SafePalAddAddress.message: An address generation request has been sent to your SafePal App. Open the SafePal app to complete the steps.

UseBlockchainDappsTip.message: Please add {{chain}} network to your wallet first

UseBlockchainDappsTip2.message: This wallet is imported by private kay and only supports {{chain}} blockchain. To use {{dappChain}} blockchain Dapps or tokens, please switch to other wallets.

feeSmallerTip.message: Current fee is smaller than the recommended fee,this could lead to transaction failure or longer pending period. Confirm to proceed?

inputMax.message: If you select “MAX” transfer amount, the actual amount sent will be calculated as your balance minus gas fees in the next step.

tipsUtxoTxNoInput.message: There could be un-confirmed transaction on the blockchain. Please stay connected and try again later.

tronSendFeeHoldHind.message: Please make sure you have an amount of TRX.

insufficientTronGasFee.message: This transaction needs at least 10 TRX to pay for the miner fee.

Insufficient__funds__lock.message: Insufficient funds. Your account is required to lock {{amount}} on the {{chain}} network.

invitationCodeTip.message: Send invitation code to your friends and enjoy the seamless experience together!

ReconnectTip.message: If resending the transaction does not work, please reconnect your SafePal App

ResendTip.message: Resend the transaction to your SafePal App

SwapTip.message: Please note that due to exchange rate fluctuations, the amount you receive may differ from the estimated receive amount.

SlippageTip.message: Your transaction will not be processed if the price changes unfavorable by more than this percentage.

SwapOrderDetailTip.message: This order is pending due to exceeded slippage.

InsufficientNetworkFee.message: You need {{coin}} as the network fee to transfer the {{token}} token. Please deposit sufficient {{coin}} in the current wallet first.

useProviderTip.message: Click to switch between SafePal and MetaMask

useSafePal.message: Refresh the website to enable the SafePal wallet provider.

useMetaMask.message: Refresh the website to enable the Metamask wallet provider.

createTip.message: Add a Wallet to Start Your Crypto Journey

ApproveTip.message: By signing this message you give authorization to this smart contract to move or spend your funds, proceed at you own risk! Only authorize for the DApp you trust.

swapNotSupportPrivate.message: Swap does not support private key wallets.

mnemonicsVisibleTip.message: SafePal does not store or access your mnemonic phrase, and losing the phrase will lead to permanent asset loss. Do not screenshot or take a picture of your phrase. Never share it to anyone and only store it offline on a piece of paper or

No__response__from__your__mobile__App.message: No response from your mobile App

ReconnectTipWalletConnect.message: If resending the transaction does not work, please reconnect your mobile App

ResendTipWalletConnect.message: Resend the transaction to your mobile App

AddCustomNetworkTip.message: A malicious network provider could fake blockchain data and pose potential risks to your assets. Only add custom networks you trust. If you have any doubt, contact the project team to get the correct information for this page.

AddCustomNetworkErr.message: Chain ID {{chainId}} already exists, please do not add this chain repeatedly.

CheckUrlText.message: This domain is currently on the SafePal domain warning list. Based on the information we have, SafePal believes this domain could compromise your wallet security, thus we have restricted the access to this site.

CheckSignText.message: This contract is currently on the SafePal warning list. Based on the information we have, SafePal believes this contract could compromise your wallet security, thus we have restricted the approval to this contract.

CheckUrlTip.message: Please note that our warning list is on a voluntary basis. It may be inaccurate or incomplete. Please be careful, do more research and do not connect your wallet to suspicious DApps.

Enter__your__private__key__to__import__t.message: Enter your private key to import the wallet

swapBTCErrTip.message: SafePal extension wallet does not support Binance provider, please download the SafePal App to use Binance provider.

resetApprovalTip.message: The transaction amount for {{symbol}} exceeds your approved limit {{num}}. Please reset approval limits to continue.

swapIncludesTip2.message: We find the best price from the top liquidity sources, every time. A fee of {{fee}}% is automatically factored into this quote.

swapIncludesTip4.message: Withdraw fee is charged by the provider.

swapApprovalTip.message: You must give the {{provider}} smart contracts permission to use your {{symbol}}.

BuyTip.message: Buy with Credit/Debit Card, ACH, Apple Pay...

BuyInputErrTip.message: The purchase amount should be between $50 and $20,000

Pay__for__Gas__with__Received__Coins.message: Pay for Gas with Received Coins

WithoutGasTip.message: Users who do not have gas coins in their wallets can pay gas fees with tokens at the gas station.

httpRequired.message: URLs require the appropriate HTTP/HTTPS prefix.

SetSafePalWallet.message: Set SafePal Wallet as default wallet when connecting to DApps.

ConnectDAppsText1.message: Multiple ways to easily connect to DApps

ConnectDAppsText2.message: Choose one of this on the DApp’s website:

ConnectDAppsTip3.message: Set SafePal wallet as default, then try other wallet’s icon

NoGasTip.message: You don't have enough {{name}} to cover network fees.

NoGasBtnTip1.message: Support Credit/Debit Card, Apple Pay, PIX and more.

NoGasBtnTip2.message: Buy with SFP or Stable coins.

NoGasBtnTip3.message: Receive coins from other wallets or exchanges.

SetSafePalWalletTip.message: Connect to all DApps that support MetaMask, just click the MetaMask icon and SafePal will respond.

noDappTip.message: You can try searching on dapp.com or dappradar.com. Beaware of scam DApps, only connect DApps you trusted.

BalanceTipsXLM.message: The absolute minimum balance for an XLM account is 1XLM

Reserved__for__Storage__text.message: This is the minimum NEAR balance your account must maintain to remain active. This balance represents the storage space your account is using on the NEAR blockchain (with a small buffer), and will go up or down as you use more or less space.

Reserved__for__Transactions__text.message: Up to {{num}} NEAR is reserved to cover the cost of transactions.

Available__Balance__text.message: This is your spendable NEAR balance, and can be used or transferred immediately.

AddContactText1.message: You don’t have any contact yet.

AddContactText2.message: You can add contacts in ‘Settings’ - ‘Address Book’

DOTTip1.message: On the Polkadot network, if you are sending funds out of an account, which will leave the remaining balance under {{amount}} {{symbol}}, the account will be deactivated and the funds reaped. To avoid losing your funds, please either keep the balance above {{amount}} {{symbol}}, or transfer all of the funds out of the wallet.

DOTTip2.message: Due to the restriction of the destination address, this transfer must be more than {{amount}} {{symbol}}.

EnterAddress2.message: Please enter address, Space ID, ARBID, ENS...

ConnectLedger1.message: Connect your Ledger device via USB

ConnectLedger2.message: After connecting the USB port, please unlock your ledger device and open Ethereum app.

ConnectLedgerErr1.message: Please ensure your hardware wallet is properly connected and unlocked.

LedgerSignTip1.message: Please connect your Ledger device and open the Ethereum app to sign the transaction.

ConnectLedger4.message: Now you can use Ledger wallet on SafePal Extension

impactTip1.message: High price impact! More than {{scale}} drop!

impactTip2.message: The price impact is too high and it may lead to a loss of more than {{scale}} of your funds. Are you sure to swap?

BalanceTipsXRP.message: The XRP network requires a one-time fee of 10 XRP for account activation

xrpFristSendLimitTips.message: Based on XRP network rules, you need to send at least 10 XRP to activate the recipient's address.

HideSmallTransactionTip1.message: You can hide transactions with small amount to prevent ‘Zero Transfer Scam’.

HideSmallTransactionTip3.message: This setting will be applied to all transaction lists of all the wallets and coins.

ViewHiddenTransaction.message: {{num}} transaction records have been hidden. View >

showPrivateTip.message: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private keys can steal any assets held in your account.

showPrivateTip1.message: 1. Before copying the private key, ensure the security of the clipboard premission to avoid leakage caused by the clipboard being read by other software.

showPrivateTip2.message: 2. Please write down and save the private key correctly, and do not transmit or store it over the internet.
